title: RIGHT
description: Returns a substring containing the specified number of characters from the end (right side) of the provided string.

parameters.name: num_chars
parameters.description: The number of characters to extract from the left.

examples:
RIGHT("HelloWorld", 5)
-- Returns: "World"
-- It extracts the last 5 characters of "HelloWorld".

RIGHT("Test", 10)
-- Returns: "Test"
-- Since "Test" has only 4 characters, the entire string is returned.

RIGHT(Phone, 4)
-- Extracts the last 4 characters from the field 'Phone'
-- For example, if Phone is "123-456-7890", this returns "7890".

tips.text: num_chars must be a non-negative integer. If num_chars is 0, an empty string is returned.
